author: G. Padmanaban
title: Looking beyond just diagnosis and quarantine
description: There is need in India for a rapid response research and development team to handle viral onslaughts
content: A pandemic is upon the world and coronavirus is not the last word. Ebola, Zika, Nipah, SARS, MERS, H1N1 and now COVID-19 the viral onslaughts will continue. Mutations of known viruses will periodically cause havoc, whatever be the reasons. While the Zika viru… [+5422 chars]
